programme.desc: This episode looks at the theft of a self-portrait of Rembrandt in a brutal robbery in Stockholm and hears from the investigators leading a complex hunt from Russian organised crime to America.

programme.title: This Is BBC Four
programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.title: A Garden in Snowdonia
programme.desc: The garden is under a carpet of snow and closed to the public. Head gardener Troy Scott Smith plans a winter garden to attract more visitors. A 300-year-old oak tree is dying and a plague of moles wreak havoc.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: The real side of boating with Robbie Cumming. On the last leg of his epic journey across the North of England, Robbie tackles the fast-flowing River Ouse and is forced to make an emergency stop. His destination is Ripon Basin at the outer reaches of our inland waterways.

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom and Barbara discover oil in Surbiton - can they swap it for some straw? Meanwhile, Margo refuses to dress up like a tart in her music societys production of `Sweet Charity.

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Jim Hacker steps out in favour of abolishing smoking through excessive taxation.

programme.title: How the Celts Saved Britain
programme.desc: While in Britain Germanic barbarism replaced Roman civilisation, Christianity transformed Ireland into the cultural powerhouse of early medieval Europe. Snow follows in the footsteps of Irelands earliest missionaries as they bring Christianity, literacy and technological progress to the future nations of Scotland and England.

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: Katya is a young welder, tough, self-reliant and determined to leave her traumatic childhood behind. But when shes unexpectedly forced to care for her vulnerable half-sister, everything changes. Thrown into a role she never asked for, Katya must confront painful memories and an estranged family, all while trying to shield the little girl from the world theyve both come from. As the sisters grow closer, Katya faces an impossible decision - one that could change both their lives forever.

programme.title: Imagine...
programme.sub-title: Tom Jones: What Good Am I?
programme.desc: Alan Yentob examines the extraordinary story of one of Britains most recognisable pop icons, Sir Tom Jones. In a frank and revealing interview, Sir Tom describes the dizzying ascent from his humble beginnings as a miners son in South Wales to becoming a headline act in Las Vegas, and recalls many of his most cherished moments from a career that enabled him to sing alongside Elvis.

programme.title: A Garden in Snowdonia
programme.desc: The garden is under a carpet of snow and closed to the public. Head gardener Troy Scott Smith plans a winter garden to attract more visitors. A 300-year-old oak tree is dying and a plague of moles wreak havoc.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: The real side of boating with Robbie Cumming. On the last leg of his epic journey across the North of England, Robbie tackles the fast-flowing River Ouse and is forced to make an emergency stop. His destination is Ripon Basin at the outer reaches of our inland waterways.

programme.title: 40 Minutes
programme.desc: Acclaimed observational documentary by BAFTA award winning director Molly Dineen set at Londons Angel tube station in 1989, three years before its desperately needed renovation. The programme provides a humorous account of 48 hours in the life of the tube station, from the daily round of fraught commuters, overburdened lifts and cancelled trains to the nightly activities when fluffers, women who clean human hair and rubbish off the tracks to avoid a fire hazard.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin struggles to keep his balance at a Liverpool house that feels like its sloping away. Jacqui is in Kent, where damp is all around. In London, Tommy thinks a layout change is in order at a one-bedroom flat.

programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp, experts Ben Cooper and Izzie Balmer and the teams go antique-hunting in Nottinghamshire, before heading to Derby for todays auction. Natasha meets a former Bargain Hunt contestant with a world record collection of bagpipes, and she has a go herself.

programme.desc: The detectorist team take on a desperate search for a couples lost wedding ring, and the hunt is on for the owner of a lost smartwatch.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: After a three-minute video featuring a female prison officer and an inmate having sex inside HMP Wandsworth goes viral, award-winning journalist Mobeen Azhar begins an investigation into what happened and why. A year of twists, turns and damning revelations pulls back the curtain on a dangerous wider world of coercion, corruption and contraband thriving behind bars.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: As Mobeens investigation deepens, it becomes clearer that illicit relationships between prisoners and jail staff are just the tip of the iceberg. The bigger story involves organised criminal gangs determined to cash in on a lucrative prison drug economy. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: After a three-minute video featuring a female prison officer and an inmate having sex inside HMP Wandsworth goes viral, award-winning journalist Mobeen Azhar begins an investigation into what happened and why. A year of twists, turns and damning revelations pulls back the curtain on a dangerous wider world of coercion, corruption and contraband thriving behind bars.

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A show celebrating some of Historys greatest, and also most formidable females. We begin with ancient tales of the Scythians - incredible warrior women who were part of the inspiration for the wonder women that were more familiar with today.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A look at some of the various ways in which, throughout history, humans have lived with, worked with, and interacted with animals - from the very first socialising with wolves thousands of years ago through to farting fish almost starting a nuclear war in more recent history. We take a trip to Elizabeth Is menagerie which was housed at the Tower of London and home to exotic animal gifts from foreign rulers, and included wolves, hyenas, bears, leopards and even lions.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are in Italy to take part in a series of tricky challenges and increasingly loud arguments as they attempt to find the worlds best hot hatchback. Clarkson is in the Citroen DS3 Racing, Hammond championing the Fiat 500C Abarth and May making the case for the Renaultsport Clio Cup. Petrolhead comedian Ross Noble is the `Star in the Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Our Girl
programme.desc: Worried about Georgies state of mind, Jamie seeks out Captain James to find out whether she is in any danger. Meanwhile, Georgie reels after hearing the news that Abu is alive and closer to her than she realises.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: After a three-minute video featuring a female prison officer and an inmate having sex inside HMP Wandsworth goes viral, award-winning journalist Mobeen Azhar begins an investigation into what happened and why. A year of twists, turns and damning revelations pulls back the curtain on a dangerous wider world of coercion, corruption and contraband thriving behind bars.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: As Mobeens investigation deepens, it becomes clearer that illicit relationships between prisoners and jail staff are just the tip of the iceberg. The bigger story involves organised criminal gangs determined to cash in on a lucrative prison drug economy. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons.

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: John and Quiet make a pit stop, where John reunites with a former contact; Sweet Tooth bonds with a new follower.

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: John and Quiet go undercover on a dangerous rescue mission; John goes up against an out-of-control opponent.

programme.title: Joe Swash: Forgotten Young Dads
programme.desc: Too often overlooked in research and marginalised in society, many young dads across the UK are quietly rewriting the rulebook on fatherhood. In this revealing documentary, Joe Swash, who became a first-time father in his mid-twenties, meets four young men navigating the challenges of parenting. From stigma and financial strain to isolation and emotional growth, this is the rarely seen lived experience of men in their teens and twenties entering into fatherhood.

programme.title: Charlie Coopers Myth Country
programme.desc: Charlie goes in search of Black Shuck, the demon dog of East Anglia. He meets locals who disagree that seeing Shuck brings with it a curse. Keen to capture the beast on camera, he attempts an overnight stakeout, with unexpected consequences.

programme.title: Charlie Coopers Myth Country
programme.desc: Charlies odyssey heads to Wiltshire, home to ancient sites such as Stonehenge, Avebury and the Westbury chalk horse, to get to the bottom of why humans feel the need to leave marks on the landscape.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: As Mobeens investigation deepens, it becomes clearer that illicit relationships between prisoners and jail staff are just the tip of the iceberg. The bigger story involves organised criminal gangs determined to cash in on a lucrative prison drug economy. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons.

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Comedian and space nerd Dara OBriain joins Rattus as guest host for a special show that marks the anniversary of the 1969 moon landings. For generations, we have looked to the stars and wondered as to the mysteries they contain.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Rattus has formed `The Demoratic Party, and has enlisted the help of a political advisor, Dani Dyer, to help him rise to political power. Although Dani may be a surprise appointment for some, her experiences on Love Island have actually given her the perfect experience of the back-stabbing, unholy alliances and lying needed for life in the political sphere. Together, they guide us through a history of politics from the birth of democracy in ancient Greece.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The lads attempt to make train travel cheaper, faster and more interesting by replacing the conventional carriages and locomotive with a series of caravans attached to a specially modified car. Also in this show, Jeremy is out on the track comparing the ripsnorting Jaguar XKR-S to the recently updated Nissan GT-R, while British comedy legend Rowan Atkinson is the `Star in the Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: The BBCs big comedy talent search, the New Comedy Awards is scouring the country to uncover the hottest new stand-ups. Ee head to the capital and the historic Alexandra Palace, home of the BBCs first broadcast. Five comics will battle it out to book their place in this years grand final showdown, where one will be crowned the BBC New Comedian of 2025. Hosting the comedy extravaganza is comedian, actor, presenter and writer Sara Pascoe.

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: The Archer is about to be demolished in this special horror episode. The gang decide to break in for one last night together, but once inside, strange things start to happen and they find themselves trapped inside a pub that seems intent on killing them, one by one.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: Wes Craven re-invented and revitalised the slasher-horror genre with this modern horror classic, which manages to be funny, clever and scary, as a fright-masked knife maniac stalks high-school students in middle-class suburbia. Craven is happy to provide both tension and self-parody as the body count mounts - but the victims arent always the ones youd expect.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sian Eleri investigates a seemingly ordinary farmhouse in north Wales, which, in the late 1990s, was widely considered the most haunted house in Britain. The story made local and national headlines as the family who lived at the farm became ever more desperate in their search for answers. More than 300 allegedly paranormal events were documented at the Flintshire farmhouse in video footage, audio interviews, photos and eyewitness accounts - all of which has been locked away until now.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sian is frustrated that she still hasnt been able to contact the Gower family who lived at the farmhouse - David, a former headmaster, his wife Rose-Mary and their son John-Paul. But there is a breakthrough of another kind when the current owner of Penyffordd Farm gets in touch and invites her over to see the house shes heard so much about. Sian is welcomed in by Michael, who bought the house in Flintshire from the Gowers despite stories that it was haunted.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sian Eleris investigation into the haunting of Penyffordd Farm continues as multiple witnesses claim to have seen a hooded figure. She wonders whether they could really have all imagined the same thing.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sians investigation into an allegedly haunted house in North Wales concludes. She must track down the last family members and solve whether this really was paranormal or all a hoax.

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: A family attempt to save their failing funeral home in the sleepy Scottish fishing village of Kincully. Archie, having recently inherited the floundering family business from his domineering dad, is determined to prove himself.

A year of twists, turns and damning revelations pulls back the curtain on a dangerous wider world of coercion, corruption and contraband thriving behind bars.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by the latest banished and murdered players as he tells them the identity of the Traitors for the first time.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash - anything between zero and a whopping £4,000.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: A four-metre high gorilla made out of 40,000 spoons and a massive millipede with golf clubs for legs! Caroline visits a sculpture park where nothing goes to waste.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team revive a working model of a Welsh coal mine, original plans for a British engineering classic and a Victorian writing box owned by a trailblazing female journalist.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Today, John, Maria, Caroline and Mark battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its week 3 of Great British Menus 20th series. Four chefs compete for Scotland with starters and fish dishes inspired by Great Scots of the past. Who will be eliminated?

programme.title: Wonders of the Monsoon
programme.desc: An extraordinary story of the relationship between nature and the people of the monsoon, from the ancient past to the future.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin presents from the heart of Birmingham and its historic Museum and Art Gallery. Paul also explores the museums collection of Pre-Raphaelite art and discovers the work of Arts and Crafts jewellery designers Arthur and Georgie Gaskin.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Jack Carroll, Dani Harmer, Dominic Littlewood and Shivi Ramoutar test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Fleur East dishes up all the behind-the-scenes action from the world of Strictly Come Dancing, and Choreography Corner is back to dissect the rest of the weekends Iconic performances.

programme.title: Nigella: At My Table
programme.desc: Nigella shares recipes that are perfect for winding down at the end of a long day, including chicken with red grapes and marsala, followed by sunken chocolate amaretto cake, with crumbled amaretti cream dolloped alongside.

programme.title: Mary at 90: A Lifetime of Cooking
programme.desc: Dame Mary and Tom Allen take a leisurely boat ride together, stopping along the way to cook delicious recipes - some Mary made over 70 years ago, others that are brand new.

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Gold is found at a bishops palace, a Roman crime is uncovered, detectorists unearth a staggering bronze age haul, and ancient DNA solves a medieval mystery.

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: A quiz which compensates for the level of difficulty by awarding points, not just for correct answers but also for `interesting answers, regardless of whether or not they even have anything to do with the original question asked.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Long-term mates Joe Wilkinson and Zoe Lyons, whove travelled to gigs together for years, take on the wilds of eastern Turkey.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Highland Cops
programme.desc: Bomb disposal are called in when a chemical lab is found in a flat. police search for missing walkers in Glencoe, and wildlife cops investigate an attack on a bird of prey.

programme.title: Stacey and Joe
programme.sub-title: Theres Life in the Old Dog Still
programme.desc: Stacey heads to stunning Lake Como as shes all set to launch a new product as part of her beauty brand... but this time shes also the model! Its not all plain sailing as she takes to the lake to get her vogue on. But, more importantly, will she bump into local resident George Clooney? Meanwhile, Joe is left holding the fort back at Pickle Cottage. In Staceys absence, Joe finds himself juggling kids, a long list of chores and all the animal care, so hes invited his family over to help out.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the celebrity players gather for breakfast, their focus is solely on the game and who they can - and more importantly cant - trust.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by the latest banished and murdered players as he tells them the identity of the Traitors for the first time! With series 2 Faithful Jaz.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Bear Gliding; The Sound of a Lemming; Bear in the Wind; Construction Bear; Kung Fu Lemmings; A Midsummer Bears Dream; Manufacturing Secret; Bling Bli
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky Lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Getting Truffy With It; Good Vibrations; Puffs Perfect Picnic; Run, Mushpie, Run; Watch the Storm
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: The Staff Of Wisdom; Let It Bee; Bird Call; The Hero Trap
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.title: Moley
programme.sub-title: Keeper for a Day; For All Molekind; Some Like it Cool; Duck Moley Duck!
programme.desc: Revolving around an adventurous moles quest with friends to broker peace between humans and moles. Following the underground adventures of the charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: There is a new lawman in town and his name is Dead Justice! An undead cowboy sheriff who once patrolled the streets of Crystal Cove, Justice has now returned to take back his old job. That means getting rid of the gangs number one nemesis, Sheriff Stone.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
programme.desc: The Scooby gang are invited by their friend to spend the weekend at her estate - until they see a mysterious figure enter an old mansion and decide to investigate.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: The Scooby Gang heads to the eerie town of Banning Junction to spend Halloween with Velmas aunt, uncle and her beautiful and flirtatious cousin Marcy. The townspeople celebrate 100 Years of Halloween, including a crowning of the Queen of the Masquerade Ball and a performance by KISS. When spine-tingling events begin to occur, a fearful townswoman blames it on a ghost whos come back for revenge.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Ghost of Psychic U!
programme.desc: The team is back and just as courageous, adventurous, humorous and obsessed with cases like before. They are joined by celebrities in their adventures and ghost hunts and in search of puzzles to solve.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Haunted Holidays
programme.desc: Scooby Doo and the gang discover a haunted clock tower with a troubled past.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Best of Monsters
programme.desc: The gangs visit to Fort Knox uncovers a priceless monster.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Mask of the Blue Falcon
programme.desc: The Mystery Inc. team stops monsters from ruining a convention.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: The gang attend a Renaissance faire, where a dragon interrupts their fun.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: A Mystery Solving Gang Divided!; Revenge of the Swamp Monster!
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the gang travel to Chambersburg a battlefield near Gettysburg to investigate the mysterious appearance of ghost zombie Civil War soldiers. / Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang meet up with basketball legend and bowling aficionado.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: A Terrifying Round With A Menacing Metallic Clown; Camp Comeoniwannascareya
programme.desc: Shaggy competes in a mini golf tournament that is terrorised by a giant metallic clown. / Shaggy and Scooby are camp counsellors when a ghost story comes to life!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Best Mysteries
programme.desc: Theres a new girl at Crystal Cove High named Alice May, and shes set her romantic sights on Fred.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! and the Spooky Scarecrow
programme.desc: Scooby and the gang try to stop a spooky scarecrow that is attacking people in Cobb Corners haunted corn maze. Can they save Halloween?

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: The Phantom, The Talking Dog And The Hot Hot Hot Sauce!; The Hot Dog Dog!
programme.desc: Daphne gets a call from a friend that needs help. The gang heads to Nashville, Tennessee to meet up with none other than country music legend Kacey Musgraves! / Our mystery-solving gang is in Chicago investigating the haunting.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: Mummy Scares Best; The Fast And The Wormious
programme.desc: The Mystery Inc. gang travels to Egypt, where, on an archaeological dig, a mummy is on the loose and turning everyone into Zombies. / In Mexico, the gang tries to stop a giant sand worm from wreaking havoc on the Enduro Slam 5000 off-road race.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Around The World
programme.desc: Scooby Doo and the gang travel up a lost river in the Amazon rainforest with famous comedian and actor Jason Sudeikis in search of a great treasure.

programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `hair and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see various types of hair from curly to straight, brown to pink and even whizzy, whirly hair! We see cloudy hair and rainbow hair.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: Lu has trouble finding a new book she enjoys as much as her last one. But still she succeeds and together with Declan and Elodie she has a fun adventure.

programme.title: Piggy Builders
programme.desc: Fred and Danas door makes a squeaky sound, so they call the Piggy Builders to fix it. The Piggies decide to upgrade the entire door. They build the greatest door ever, but then forget how to open it.

programme.title: Twirlywoos

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky and Laa-Laa are in Home Dome when the Tubby Phone rings. Its Dipsy and Po calling from the Tubby Mobile to say hello.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Evie, Joseph, Luke, Thea, Benjamin, Eliza and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Parents, carers and their babies at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Inside everyones bags are blankets which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding a baby appropriate blanket inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby!

programme.title: I Spy, You Spy
programme.desc: Elsee joins her friend Ellie-Mai in the park for a picnic and a game of I Spy.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Triggs is feeling a bit blue and finding it hard to get out of bed, and that pesky birdie outside his window is not helping. But Maddie soon helps him discover what the birdie is really singing about.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan takes on new careers - from doctor and pizza chef to hair stylist and sea captain - and invites his friends Ozzy, Daisy and Bitsy along with the viewers to join him.

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Kiri and Lou meet a shy little creature called Small. It turns out shes a fan, and shes even written a song about them.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: When a young Watermelonsuchus gets beached during a heatwave, Ginger and the Pea-Rexes get creative to work out a way to get the giant baby into the water.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and dad tease mum about being fussy when packing to go to the pool. But when they arrive underprepared, they realise that mum was right all along.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels enjoy bird watching with Duggee, but wish to learn what else birds do, other than fly. He explains that you can learn more about nature and wildlife, if you follow five easy steps.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Catchers arrive on a planet populated by aliens resembling funny little monkeys.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Timmy and his friends are playing ball games, catch, crazy golf, tennis and so on. Stripey just cant get the hang of hand-to-eye co-ordination and is upset when Yabba gets impatient with him.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: Meet sisters Kyra and Khloe as they go on a big family day out to a farm. There are lots of exciting things to do, including a pony ride. They explore an amazing maze where the girls find a giant sunflower.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Annabels mum has shown her a special way to make a traditional Austrian desert called Kaiserschmarren, which she serves with blueberries and raspberries. Austria is famous for wonderful cakes, pastries and puddings, so lets hope that Annabels friends like it as much as she does. Annabel dresses in traditional clothing and invites her friends to eat in her wooden Austrian chalet.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Emily wants to find out more about puffins in this episode, so Rory and Sandy head to a very special Scottish island to search for them. Theyre able to see where they nest in burrows and hunt for food by diving into the sea. And Chantelle joins Aneeshwar, who is a keen bird watcher - together they try to spot a puffling, a baby puffin, in the cliffs. Chantelle and Rorys fact files help answer all of Emilys questions.

programme.title: Whats on Your Head?
programme.desc: Alexandra shows us her barristers wig. She explains why she loves her wig so much and what it means to be able to wear it.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Mrs Farrell and Miss Gerrard are having a Kindness Day at school, a time when the class shows how they can be extra kind to each other. As the children start their day, they are thinking of new ideas to be super-kind. Jessica and Orla draw lovely pictures for the teachers, which makes Mrs Farrell and Miss Gerrard feel happy. At lunchtime Solomon is finding the lid on his yogurt a bit tricky, so Sam helps him to open it!

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: In this episode, CBeebies very own motorbike rider, Grace, shows off three amazing machines that run on rails! Grace helps drive a tram that can go up a very big hill, shows off a monorail and is a co-driver in a high-speed train!

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `glasses, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We spy various types of glasses from bright yellow glasses to help-you-see glasses, and even spot a crocodile balancing glasses on its nose.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: When Five and friends go missing from the five-star ball, Six to Ten discover they are all Five-and-a-friend! Learn about splitting numbers into smaller numbers with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: When N tries to ban D from the band, the others get the fab four back together to prove that you can do much more with four.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Sing along with Go and Stop as they get ready for a picnic.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Blue meets Deep Blue and Sky Blue and learns all about their favourite things. They embark on an adventure in a submarine to the depths of the deep blue sea and take a trip up in a plane to discover all about sky blue items.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels have just got some new walkie-talkies and are having so much fun with them. Duggee calls the Squirrels to come for some blueberry juice, but as Tag is running, he trips over a car and falls through a secret door in the wall. Communicating through his walkie-talkie, Tag doesnt know where he is. He can see lots and lots of things around him, but no-one has any idea where this room is in the house.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: When Toad finds himself with a case of puddle hiccups, its up to Yukee and the rest of the garden gang to find a cure.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies enjoy doing Round and Round the Garden, especially the end of the rhyme where they all tickle each other. The Tiddlytubbies have tickly fun too.

programme.title: Andys Safari Adventures
programme.desc: When the temperature of the African penguin enclosure accidentally gets lowered, Jen must correct it immediately, but she cant remember what the correct temperature was. To the rescue comes Andy, who jets off in his safari-mobile, heading to Africa to discover the correct temperature that makes African penguin chicks hatch from their eggs.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Waffle is sad that Mrs Hobbs and her cat, George, are soon to leave Maple Close. The Brooklyn-Bells call on Mrs Hobbs to persuade her not to move house, only to find that her cat, George, has fleas. They offer to help and discover a secret about Mrs Hobbs.

programme.title: Molly and Mack
programme.desc: Molly examines her shelf of special things at the back of Macks stall. She chooses the pony tag and remembers the day she got it. Mack is helping Daisy at the vets surgery. He takes down the details of a caller whose pony needs injections and decides to fetch the pony himself. At the farm he meets Mrs Anderson, who says that her pony Twinkle is tied up around the corner. Mack walks Twinkle back to the vets and goes inside to tell Daisy what he has done.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on the planet Shiver, a celestial body dotted with craters that shoot colourful puffs, where they meet three alien local children, whose favourite game is steal the flag.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: While rescuing river creatures after a storm, the Octonauts find a strange egg and come under attack by stinging platypuses.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Hero Rabbit
programme.desc: When a band of desperate mice mistake Benjamin for a hero and enlist him to retrieve their stolen peas, Benjamin gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels are going camping. They need to find somewhere to pitch their tent but its not as easy as they thought it would be. They all work together and finally get settled. But Tag realises he cant sleep without his teddy, and Happy would like a glass of water. Suddenly Duggee is up and down and in and out of the tent getting everything the Squirrels need. In fact, Duggee works so hard that hes the first to fall asleep.

programme.title: Vida the Vet

programme.title: Supertato

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When Cosima finally finds a quiet place to read her book, she realises peace and quiet arent all theyre made out to be. Wheres Big Lizard when she needs him?

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Bettys new ice cream flavour is so light, it makes everybody in town float in the air. How will Mojo and Bo get everyones feet back on the ground? By floating up there with them!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairytale about growing up in a wild place called the 80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo pretend that they are living on a desert island in the back garden and they discover Dad washed up on the beach. Dad needs to embrace his inner kid if he wants to make Bingo and Blueys Rug Island his home, too.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: After Pancake saves him from a mishap, Flutter vows to repay the debt. But his risk-averse behaviour drives Pan to distraction until a real emergency allows the debt to be repaid.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: The pups arrive at school one morning to discover a garden disaster. Something has made lots of holes in their plants, posing a mystery the pups must solve.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Miss Berrington, Evies new school teacher, and teaching assistant Mr ODonnell have come to meet Evie at home before term starts, and Waffle is under strict instructions to be on his best behaviour. But Waffle is teething and wont stop chewing everything in sight.

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Double act Phoenix and Mossy are on their way to meet Oona when they find Spiky the hedgehog near the Bat Cave. Hes far away from his burrows, and its getting late. Poor wee fella - hes so small and helpless... they cant leave him on his own. They decide to take him home, but on their way to the Meadow, the friends learn not to judge a book by its very cute cover.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Autumn: Its Time to Look for Clues

programme.title: Moon and Me

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Tiny and Small find a box that has fallen from space. It contains just two circles of black cloth, but these are no ordinary circles - they are holes, and one leads to another. Tiny and Small are very excited and try to tell Major about their discovery, but he is too busy to listen and so they decide to do their own experiments, with quite amazing results.

programme.desc: Ross really likes the pretty pizza-delivery woman, but his flirting technique is awful. Meanwhile, a nasty surprise awaits Joey when he tells everyone about his big television appearance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ride Along
programme.desc: The gang persuade Phoebes policeman boyfriend to let them ride in his police car. The friends enjoy the experience, until a gunshot rings out. Elsewhere, Rachel overhears a telephone message for Ross from his second ex-wife.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After Gary confides in Monica that he intends to ask Phoebe to move in with him, Monica immediately breaks her promise to him and tells Phoebe, who worries that it is too early in the relationship. She persuades Chandler to talk to Gary, hoping that Chandlers fear of commitment will rub off on him, but Garys enthusiasm overwhelms even Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Big Break
programme.desc: Joeys first major film role leads to an unexpected experience in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Phoebe cant quite remember why she hates Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang travel to Las Vegas, Nevada, where more than one surprise awaits them. After Ross misinterprets Rachels actions, a war of public humiliation results.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang are having fun in Las Vegas, where Monica and Chandler get lucky, Rachel makes Ross regret playing a prank on her, and Joey schemes for fame and fortune.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Ross cant figure out if theyre legally married, and Monica and Chandler search for matrimonial signs.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Hugs Rachel
programme.desc: Joey is upset to learn that Chandler plans to move out to live with Monica, but Rachel seems strangely unaffected by the news. Meanwhile, Phoebe pleads with Ross to either get an annulment or admit that he still loves Rachel.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler disagree over how to redecorate Rachels old room, and despite Phoebes admonitions, Ross makes a drastic decision about Rachel.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance
programme.desc: After learning that his health insurance has lapsed because he has not worked enough as an actor, Joey suffers a painful hernia, and Rachel finally finds out that Ross never annulled their marriage.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel forces Ross to terminate their marriage, Phoebes first triplet babysitting experience proves stressful, and Joey pretends to own a German sports car.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One on the Last Night
programme.desc: Its the last night before Chandler moves into Monicas apartment, leaving Joey alone and prompting Rachel to make plans to move in with Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes lack of coordination while jogging embarrasses Rachel, and Joey gets a sexy new roommate.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The bandwagon continues to Texas, where they do everything bigger - from driving tanks to experiencing space travel in a centrifuge and even looking for alien life with UFO spotters.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The final chapter in Bradley and Barneys voyage sees them visit New Orleans. Brad feeds alligators in the Bayou, has a spiritual MOT by a voodoo priest and gets on board the Natchez jazz Steamboat, before leading a street parade to end an epic trip.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Host Jimmy Carr delves into the world of opinion polls with team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson who are joined by guests Johnny Vegas, Vernon Kay, Paul Chowdhry and Katherine Ryan.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: Bill Splitting Angst and a Gassy Girlfriend
programme.desc: ...A******? Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix are on a mission to call out the nations a******s. On offer this week is a dating disaster, and a sister who took sibling jealousy too far. (S1, E01)

programme.title: Comedy Central Presents
programme.desc: Comic Jimmy Carr discusses various topics including being British and performs his unique style of comedy.

programme.title: Comedy Central Presents

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The kids head back to school as the COVID-19 pandemic continues to challenge the residents of South Park.

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: Barnwood Builders
programme.desc: The guys work with three centuries of materials and techniques in one project. Using custom 21st century steel brackets and hand-hewn 19th century beams, they create a one-of-a-kind pavilion for the Wild Rock Community Centre.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.desc: Jules Hudson is house-hunting in Cornwall with a married couple from Berkshire who have a budget of £450,000 to find a rural Cornish idyll, complete with a five-bar gate. From country cottages to a medieval manor, Jules also makes time to explore the Grade I-listed Cotehele House.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard, a Welsh antique dealer travels the length and breadth of the United Kingdom, searching old mansions and scrap yards to hunt down architectural treasures, in order to restore them to their former glory.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Resident antique photography expert Brenton West brings his expertise to bear on a camera that survived the First World War but hasnt taken a picture in over a hundred years, while leather expert Suzie adds a surprise touch that leaves the cameras owner Phil lost for words.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Resident clock maker Steve Fletcher tackles a pocket watch that has come all the way from Holland and which spent four years in a World War II Japanese internment camp undetected while secretly sewn in to the hem of a dress. Metal worker Dominic Chinea and master cooper Alastair Simms get an ancient butter churn turning, and churning, once again.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Golf loving couple Lynn and Mike from Southampton have been holidaying in Spain for 40 years and now want a holiday home there. Danni Menzies has five great options lined up for £60,000.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Two stories that,cross the globe: a womans search for her birth mother in Sri Lanka and a quest on behalf of a father, longing to find his lost son.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Including a foundlings incredible journey to Hong Kong in search of information about her origins, and a daughters desperate quest to fulfil her mothers dying wish. Abandoned in Hong Kong as a baby, all Claire Martin knows is that she arrived at Heathrow Airport in December 1962, and was adopted by a British couple.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team are called out to peoples homes with a mission to sift through a lifetime of possessions and find forgotten treasures that can be sold at auction.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team perform house clearances and uncover hidden gems. What will these antiques sell for at auction?

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques aficionados Anita Manning and Raj Bisram take in the delights of Suffolk, Kent and Surrey before heading back to Essex for their third auction. Each expert has won an auction, so its all to play for. Anita rests from shopping to visit a former silk mill with an incredible royal connection. Meanwhile, Raj hears about the birth of interior design and the pioneering artist behind it William Morris.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: A humdinger of an episode sees Anita Manning and Raj Bisram hit the road for the penultimate time. Raj has soared ahead with huge profits but Anita finds an Eastern deity figure she hopes will attract big bids. The gorgeous Kent towns of Deal, Sandwich and Faversham host our twosome for shopping but Anita learns about Whitstable Oysters and Raj detours to hear how thousands of boys became Naval officers in the area.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: A man who became famous as The Ice Baby, after being found in a London phone box on the coldest night of the year, searches for answers, while touching revelations are in store for another man who was discovered inside public toilets in Abergavenny in 1958. Presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: The incredible stories of two people who are trying to track down missing relatives, including the heart-breaking story of Jacinta Hickey who wanted to find her younger brother Paul, and after 20 years of searching, Judy Kenyons hopes of finding her mother and her sister have reached a dead end, but Long Lost Family have a surprise in store for her.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Joselyn Turner was born profoundly deaf and put in a childrens home at only two weeks old. She knows that her birth mother also had a son and is now searching for her older brother James for answers to her lifelong questions. In turn, James has also been searching for the father he never knew, and after 73 years, James finds more family than he bargained for.

programme.desc: Charlie is being tormented by an oppressive black hooded figure, and the team discover shes got a sinister attachment.

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Pembleton and Lewis team up to investigate the robbery and murder of a family in a Vietnamese restaurant. A moonlighting cop is found among the victims, and because there were no obvious signs of trouble, the detectives begin to suspect foul play.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Silent Sisters perform rites over Ser Hugh of the Vales corpse and stitch up the throat wound that killed the young knight. Lord Ned Stark and Ser Barristan Selmy look on, discussing how Ser Hugh recently was raised to knighthood and received enough money to buy some fine new armour. Ned is also suspicious of how the knight came to be matched up against Ser Gregor Clegane, known as The Mountain, in the tourney.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned deals with all sorts of new issues while King Robert goes hunting, and Tyrion must stand trial at the Eyrie for his alleged crimes.

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: The Capaccios strike out at Sangue Blu as they set out to conquer Forcella. An isolated Enzo risks not only losing his turf, but also his mens loyalty.

programme.title: Hounds of War
programme.desc: A mercenary seeks revenge after his entire team gets wiped out during a final mission.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is trying to live a quiet, honest life in a small Appalachian town. When a vicious crime boss forces him back into her services, he soon learns hes capable of anything to protect his family and his home.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: Red Right Hand

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Bon Voyage Charlie Brown (And Dont Come Back)
programme.desc: The Peanuts gang spends two adventure-filled weeks in Europe as exchange students.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: The Ogglies
programme.desc: Young Max meets the Ogglies, a family of green, garbage-eating creatures who live at the dump in the town of Smelliville. When a contractor plans to build a wellness temple at the dump, Max and his pal must hatch a plan to save the Ogglies home.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Discovering that his most-famous machine is now creating animal/vegetable hybrids, inventor Flint Lockwood and his friends venture forth to save the world from tacodiles, shrimpanzees and other creatures.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks wedding anniversary celebrations are rudely interrupted by evil wizard Clavius, who once again wants to conquer the world. When Clavius kidnaps Queen Uberta, Odette and Derek must put a stop to his fiendish schemes.

programme.title: Justice League Vs. Bizarro League
programme.desc: Superman, Batman and the rest of the Justice League team up with the Bizarro League to defeat Darkseid.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: The greatest love story of all time, set as an original pop musical. Based on the real story that inspired William Shakespeares Romeo and Juliet.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Hardings life and legacy instantly become tarnished as shes forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: Boyz N the Hood
programme.desc: John Singletons portrait of black youths struggling to survive the poverty and violence of urban Los Angeles. It follows three youths as they confront the reality of life in South Central.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but shes smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested - if she wasnt so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.
