programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: The humans and animals believe a werewolf is on the loose, so former hunter Shaw uses the opportunity to re-open the season. Boog, Elliot, and Mr Weenie have to face their fears and find the werewolf to get the season closed permanently.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2
programme.desc: Best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous dummy who brings his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the town becomes overrun with monsters, the boys join forces to save Sonnys mom and foil Slappys wicked plan.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: When an evil alien attacks the Earth, a motley crew of monsters is called into action to save the world from imminent destruction. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A high school senior befriends a strange subterranean creature after building a monster truck from bits and pieces of scrapped cars.

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly

programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2
programme.desc: Best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous dummy who brings his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the town becomes overrun with monsters, the boys join forces to save Sonnys mom and foil Slappys wicked plan.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: When an evil alien attacks the Earth, a motley crew of monsters is called into action to save the world from imminent destruction. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A high school senior befriends a strange subterranean creature after building a monster truck from bits and pieces of scrapped cars.

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: The humans and animals believe a werewolf is on the loose, so former hunter Shaw uses the opportunity to re-open the season. Boog, Elliot, and Mr Weenie have to face their fears and find the werewolf to get the season closed permanently.

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Years Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives when Y2K becomes a reality.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: Science teacher Hanks life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father only to discover his shallow grave is now empty, forcing them to question one anothers loyalty with devastating consequences as fear and paranoia set in.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Romes Colosseum explodes, Londons pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planets core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earths engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.desc: While quarantining at her familys lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: A juror for a high-profile murder trial finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma that could influence the verdict and potentially convict, or free, the accused killer.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter and a servant. They seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how the crime was committed.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officers unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Another great white shark arrives to terrorise the holiday resort of Amity Island. Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, the island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielbergs 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Now You See Me

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: When his wife and children are killed by Florida drug lord Howard Saint, vengeful FBI agent Frank Castle turns vigilante and dedicates himself to wrecking Saints life. He sets up camp in a crummy apartment, but finds his neighbours a little too neighbourly, and they end up involved in his vengeful plan.

programme.desc: A juror for a high-profile murder trial finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma that could influence the verdict and potentially convict, or free, the accused killer.

programme.title: Ruthless

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter and a servant. They seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how the crime was committed.

programme.desc: Hope realises shes not prepared to rescue animals from an oil spill, so she heads across the continent to learn from the best before disaster strikes.

programme.title: Wild Battleground
programme.desc: In oceans, lakes, and rivers, there are underwater war zones. There are also some creatures that have brutal skirmishes above the waves that determine who wins and who dies.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River, flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3000 kilometres northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: David begins his journey inside the magnificent Palm House, a unique global rainforest in London.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions camouflage.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Zambias Luangwa Valley is a remarkable ecosystem. Home to some of the most iconic African species, it is also teeming with a host of smaller animals.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: Rescued orphan Josh needs his broken wrist examined by the school vets, while Beni has a trip to the dentist to treat his bad breath.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets
programme.desc: Its November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. The ice, which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now, is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia
programme.desc: In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbours are allies, and which are foes. Who to trust, and who to avoid.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: The babysitters try to get Benis diet under control; Malika shows off her passion for fashion; Darril and Syahrini get steamy in the treetops; Cinta makes a watery discovery; two new babies arrive, one of whom is emaciated.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Following the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle, checking on a baby koala who took a swan dive and playing the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Amanda races to save an elephant calf tangled in a poachers wire snare, while back at the rescue centre, Alma tries to get the newest -- and cutest - arrival, a baby baboon nicknamed Doodle Bob, to bond with a foster baboon mother.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: The Nsefu lion pride seems perfect, with six cubs, strong males to defend them and the best territory in Zambia, but theyve got teenagers.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a scenic, thousand-mile rail journey from the Swedish capital, Stockholm, to Abisko in the northern reaches of the Arctic Circle. Steered by his 1936 edition of Bradshaws Continental Railway Guide, Michael boards a steam train to celebrate Midsummer in Marielund, learns to decorate a Dala horse in Mora and takes an icy dip in one of the countrys 96,000 lakes.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo experiences a terrifying victory roll in a World War II Spitfire, high above the most famous aerodrome of the Battle of Britain, Biggin Hill.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael makes his way to the beautiful Sussex village of Ditchling, where a Roman Catholic community of artists made their home. In the seaside town of Bexhill-on-Sea, Michael hears of the work of the wartime air raid precautions wardens.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Anglophile Derek struggles to get his message across on a rare trip abroad to pick up a Bentley, while a well-restored Ford XR2 sets the auction alight.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave finds a very rare 70s Sunbeam Lotus that has been rotting away in a farmyard for 29 years, while a Morris Minor convertible goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: As Hitlers shadow engulfs Europe, ancient castles across the continent fall under Nazi control and are transformed to serve the ambitions of the Third Reich.

programme.title: Nuremberg: Nazis on Trial
programme.desc: In November 1945 the world watched as 21 Nazis went on trial for their crimes. Why did Albert Speer break ranks with his fellow defendants and how did he evade the death penalty?

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce introduces unscreened gems from the 39th series of the show. Experts interrogate some fascinating finds including a garnet and diamond cross believed by the owner to have been gifted by Marie Antoinette en route to the guillotine.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head to Oxburgh Hall in Norfolk. Despite the wet weather, there are plenty of exciting finds, including a 300-year-old treasure box stuffed with surprises, precious family objects honouring the men of the Pathfinder squadron in the Second World War, and a set of discarded posters which bring the house down with a staggering valuation.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek makes his way to Blackpool to pick up what will be the highest priced item at the next auction. But, the 1970 Aston Martin DBS needs a tow to the local garage.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Over the years Derek has learnt to always expect the unexpected. So when Call the Midwife star, Cliff Parisi, drops off his Bedford CA campervan its just another day at the office.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: As Hitlers shadow engulfs Europe, ancient castles across the continent fall under Nazi control and are transformed to serve the ambitions of the Third Reich.

programme.title: Nuremberg: Nazis on Trial
programme.desc: In November 1945 the world watched as 21 Nazis went on trial for their crimes. Why did Albert Speer break ranks with his fellow defendants and how did he evade the death penalty?

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce introduces unscreened gems from the 39th series of the show. Experts interrogate some fascinating finds including a garnet and diamond cross believed by the owner to have been gifted by Marie Antoinette en route to the guillotine.

programme.title: Sacred Rivers with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Starting his journey at the first bend in the Yangtze, Simon follows the river to Dazu where he sees 50,000 ancient and exquisite rock carvings, some of the only religious artefacts not to have been destroyed under communist rule.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Gus and Will find an old Alfa 155 in a barn, which is entirely original. The price seems good too, but on taking a second look, the undercarriage of the vehicle appears to be in a sorry state.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The Restos team try their hardest not to go too far on an Opel Manta. And a Peugeot 205 GTI brings back happy B-road memories for a mechanic who owned one.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek makes his way to Blackpool to pick up what will be the highest priced item at the next auction. But, the 1970 Aston Martin DBS needs a tow to the local garage.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Anglophile Derek struggles to get his message across on a rare trip abroad to pick up a Bentley, while a well-restored Ford XR2 sets the auction alight.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave finds a very rare 70s Sunbeam Lotus that has been rotting away in a farmyard for 29 years, while a Morris Minor convertible goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Exploring Old Byron Hot Springs in the Californian desert - a once glittering Hollywood hotspot, converted into a top-secret interrogation centre.

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo follows his 1930s Bradshaws guide to the unspoilt East Sussex Cinque Port of Rye. On the windswept harbour beach, he hears how, in 1928, a generation of lifeboatmen lost their lives in a tragic rescue attempt at sea.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael heads to the splendid Walmer Castle, home during the 1920s to Lord Beauchamp. Michaels guide, the founder of the LGBTQ working group for English Heritage, tells Michael of the lavish homosexual parties Lord Beauchamp held at the castle.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.sub-title: Herne Bay to Leeds Castle, Kent
programme.desc: Michael reaches the Kent seaside resort of Herne Bay, where he learns about a pioneering aviatrix who began her working life as a typist in Hull but whose epic achievements made her an international celebrity.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael continues his journeys in greater London. Beginning on its southeastern fringe in the leafy and historic village of Chislehurst, Michael finds surprising imperial connections and a dark labyrinth beneath.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A delightful collection of British classics comes up for auction, including an Austin A35 and a Hillman Avenger Estate in stunning condition. An E-Type Jaguar also hits the auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Three MGs from the 70s turn up at the garage, still covered in original factory wax. Nobody can believe it, or value them. A Morris 1000 turns up at the auction along with a TR7 V8.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: A Secret to Win the War
programme.desc: In 1942, a mysterious technology is facilitating a deadly Blitz. Desperate for answers, British intelligence sets its sights on an installation in Bruneval, France.

programme.title: Nuremberg: Nazis on Trial
programme.desc: In 1945 the world watched as leading Nazis went on trial for their crimes. How did Commander-in-chief Goering attempt to reignite Nazi pride and how effective were his efforts?

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team look back to choose their favourite moments of series 31 and update some of the star items valued. Includes the moment when a £1 bootsale buy went on to become the best investment in Roadshow history, with footage from the exciting auction.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: At Samares Manor in Jersey the experts scrutinise objects from Japan, South Africa, Egypt, America and France. One of the most valuable watches ever seen on the show is uncovered, and there is the bizarre find of Marilyn Monroes lemon squeezer. In a first for the 32-year-old series, a forensic test is performed live to prove the worth of a gold bangle.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek picks up an impressive five vehicle haul from a collector who can no longer look after his motors. Pauls out on the road too - hes collecting a rare 1972 Lancia Fulvia Berlina.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave picks up a 1970s Alfa Romeo that once starred in a chocolate advert. Meanwhile, Derek casts his eye over a Citroen 2CV before becoming distracted by a treasure trove of more than 270 motorbikes in the same garage.

programme.title: Equator
programme.desc: Simon Reeve takes a 25,000-mile journey around the Equator. He catches malaria in Gabon and struggles on through the war-ravaged Democratic Republic of Congo, goes rafting in the source of the Nile and witnesses a bullfight in Kenya. His journey ends in the desert on the Somalia border where thousands of refugees have escaped the fighting in their homeland.

programme.title: Train Truckers
programme.desc: The Train Truckers are on the clock and up against it as they attempt to move both a 100-tonne diesel engine to a gala extravaganza and a 175-tonne rail crane that is destined for Egypt.

programme.desc: The maintenance crews test pantographs, repair faulty air conditioning units and clear debris from overhead high voltage train power lines.
